articles.title: African leaders leave Russia summit without grain deal or a path to end the war in Ukraine - The Associated Press
articles.description: African leaders are leaving two days of meetings with Russian President Vladimir Putin with little to show in response to their requests to resume a deal that kept grain flowing from Ukraine and to find a way to end the war there. During a press conference Sa…

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: West African leaders meet over Niger coup, junta warns against intervention - Reuters
articles.description: Niger's military leaders warned against any armed intervention in the country as West African leaders are set to gather in Nigeria's capital on Sunday for an emergency summit to decide on further actions to pressure the army to restore constitutional order.
